techtree:
Stone: Bronze: Iron: The point at which the player starts using iron, for this mod vanilla iron and iron made from the OT(Oracular-Traverse) is classed as :Pig Iron:, this iron will be used for casting more than smithing creating :Cast Iron: when re-melting the pig-iron which can then be poured into casts such as pans or heavy tools. Cast Iron is resistant to wear and tear, Steel:
